prompts.prompt: Can you help me create a simple Excel budget tracker? I need columns for income, expenses, and a running balance calculation.
I have a CSV file with sales data that I need to convert to Excel format and add some basic charts to visualize the trends.
My Excel file has a bunch of #DIV/0! errors in the profit margin calculations. Can you fix these and make sure all formulas work properly?
I need to analyze this customer data spreadsheet - can you tell me the average order value, top customers, and monthly trends?
Can you create a financial model for my startup? I need 3-year projections with revenue growth assumptions, operating expenses, and cash flow calculations.
I have an existing expense report template that needs updating. Can you add new categories, update the formulas, but keep the same formatting and colors?
I need to merge data from 3 different Excel files into one master spreadsheet, then create a dashboard with key metrics and charts.
Can you build a comprehensive DCF valuation model with sensitivity analysis? I need proper color coding for inputs vs formulas, and it should handle multiple scenarios.
I have a complex inventory management spreadsheet with broken formulas across multiple sheets. Can you fix all the errors, add data validation, and create summary reports?

Create a dynamic project management dashboard that pulls data from multiple sheets, calculates resource allocation, tracks milestones, and generates automated status reports with conditional formatting.
